msg: Documenting some of the locationmap syntax as comments/examples until it can be done more formally.

author: maxime
msg: Fixed newly introduced bug, moved some variable declarations.

author: rgraham
msg: Added the documents created that are to be published. Almost completed the XSLT for publishing. Should be the next commit.

author: rgraham
msg: Fixed neutral-ordering.xsl to work as I wanted, or near to it with things sorted by type and secondly by name.

author: asmuts
msg: Changed listener thread to a daemon.
Made executor on listener use a daemon setting thread factory.
1.2.6.7 was compiled under jdk 1.4.  The new jgroups jar forces a 1.4 compilation.
I will move jgroups to the 1.4 extension build later so we can continue with 1.3.
